item.title: Ravichandran Ashwin retirement reactions LIVE: Virat Kohli shares emotional note; ‘Had a long journey together since 2010,’ says Rohit Sharma - The Hindu
item.description:
Ravichandran Ashwin retirement reactions LIVE: Virat Kohli shares emotional note; ‘Had a long journey together since 2010,’ says Rohit Sharma

Published: December 18, 2024, Source: The Hindu

India’s key spinner Ravichandran Ashwin announced his retirement from international cricket on December 18, 2024, following the third Test match of the Border-Gavaskar series against Australia.

  • Ashwin is the second-fastest player to achieve 500 Test wickets, reaching this milestone in 98 matches.
  • Throughout his career, he has taken 765 wickets and holds 37 five-wicket hauls.
  • Notable reactions include heartfelt messages from Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma, highlighting the impact Ashwin had on their careers.
“I’ve played with you for 14 years and when you told me today you’re retiring, it made me a bit emotional.” - Virat Kohli

The cricket community pays tribute to Ashwin's remarkable contributions to the sport.

item.title: NASA alert: 84-foot asteroid to pass close to Earth today - The Times of India
item.description:
NASA Alert: 84-Foot Asteroid to Pass Close to Earth Today

Date: Today

Source: NASA

This article discusses the close approach of an 84-foot asteroid to Earth, highlighting its proximity and any potential implications for our planet.

  • NASA has issued an alert regarding the close passage of the asteroid.
  • The asteroid measures approximately 84 feet in diameter.
  • This event occurs today, with minimal risk to Earth.
"NASA monitors near-Earth objects to ensure the safety of the planet."

The passage of this asteroid serves as a reminder of the importance of monitoring celestial objects that come close to Earth.

item.title: OnePlus 13, OnePlus 13R India Launch Date Officially Confirmed; Check Expected Specs, Price - Zee News
item.description:
OnePlus 13, OnePlus 13R India Launch Date Officially Confirmed

Date: January 7, 2025 | Source: Zee News

The OnePlus 13 series, including the OnePlus 13 and OnePlus 13R, is set to launch globally with a special event in India.

  • The launch event will commence at 9:00 pm IST on January 7, 2025, coinciding with OnePlus's 11th anniversary.
  • The smartphones will be available via Amazon and OnePlus India e-store.
  • Globally, the OnePlus 13 has already been released in China.
  • The expected price for OnePlus 13 is around Rs 65,000.
  • Specifications include a 6.82-inch Quad-HD+ AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC, and a triple camera setup.
“The event will be live-streamed on OnePlus’s official channels.”

For more updates, stay tuned to official sources regarding the OnePlus 13 series.

item.title: Tech News Today Live Updates on December 18, 2024: POCO M7 Pro 5G smartphone first impressions: Budget segment, redefined! | Mint - Mint
item.description:
POCO M7 Pro 5G smartphone first impressions: Budget segment, redefined!

Date: 18 Dec, 2024 Source: LiveMint

The POCO M7 Pro 5G promises to redefine the budget smartphone segment by offering premium features at an affordable price.

  • The POCO M7 Pro 5G features a 120Hz AMOLED display, a 50MP camera, and powerful performance under ₹17,000.
  • The article discusses the growing importance of staying informed about technological advancements affecting consumers and industries.
“In an era dominated by rapid technological evolution, staying informed with the latest technology news is essential.”

This smartphone aims to deliver flagship-like features to budget-conscious consumers, impacting the smartphone market significantly.

item.title: OpenAI challenges Google: ChatGPT Search now free for all users - India TV News
item.description:
OpenAI Challenges Google: ChatGPT Search Now Free for All Users

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: India TV News

OpenAI, one of the most popular chatbot's founding companies has intensified competition with Google by making its ChatGPT Search feature free. This AI-powered search engine is now accessible to all users, promising to revolutionize online search.

  • ChatGPT Search, launched in November 2024, was initially for paid users only.
  • The feature is now free, positioning it as a direct competitor to Google.
  • It offers a user-friendly interface with direct answers and sources for queries.
  • OpenAI has introduced advanced voice mode for hands-free operation.
  • A map feature has been integrated, allowing users to locate nearby places.
  • Continuous updates aim to enhance user experience and functionality.
“The free availability of ChatGPT Search…could significantly disrupt the dominance of traditional search engines like Google.”

This move by OpenAI represents a significant shift in the online search landscape, potentially offering users a fresh alternative to traditional search engines.

item.title: Fed set to deliver 3rd rate cut and Honda Nissan merger - what’s moving markets - Investing.com
item.description:
Fed Set to Deliver 3rd Rate Cut and Honda Nissan Merger - What’s Moving Markets

Date: December 13, 2023 | Source: Investing.com

The Federal Reserve is expected to announce its third consecutive rate cut, while Honda and Nissan are in discussions about a potential merger amid various market movements.

  • The Fed is likely to cut rates by 25 basis points, with further cuts anticipated in January due to labor market softness.
  • US stock futures edged higher, preparing for the Fed's final decision of the year.
  • Oil prices showed mixed results as traders awaited the Fed's announcement and assessed the impacts of new sanctions on Russia.
  • Honda and Nissan are exploring a merger as they face challenges in the electric vehicle sector.
  • Bitcoin experienced profit-taking after reaching record highs ahead of the Fed's decision.
"Our baseline forecast is that it cuts again on 29 January, because we expect the incoming labour market data to soften further," stated analysts at Standard Chartered.

In conclusion, the Fed's rate decision is widely watched, and the potential merger between Honda and Nissan highlights significant trends in the automotive industry.

item.title: Priyanka Gandhi To Be Part Of House Panel On 'One Nation, One Poll': Sources - NDTV
item.description:
Priyanka Gandhi To Be Part Of House Panel On 'One Nation, One Poll': Sources

Date: November 24, 2024 Source: NDTV

Priyanka Gandhi and Manish Tewari are nominated to study the 'one nation, one election' Constitution Amendment Bill, which proposes simultaneous elections in India.

  • Priyanka Gandhi and Manish Tewari are among Congress nominees for the panel.
  • The bill was introduced amid opposition protests regarding its implications on federalism.
  • The BJP is likely to lead the committee, which will consist of a maximum of 31 members.
  • The panel has an initial period of 90 days to submit its report.
  • The Constitution amendment proposes changes to allow simultaneous federal and state elections.
“This move directly challenges the federal nature of the country... by imposing uniformity across states.” - Manish Tewari

The upcoming committee discussions are crucial as they will address concerns about the federal structure and the integrity of diverse state elections in India.

item.title: PM Modi supports Amit Shah, says ‘Congress’s lies cannot hide its insults to Ambedkar, our reverence for him absolute’ - The Hindu
item.description:
PM Modi Defends Amit Shah Against Congress Insults to Ambedkar

Published: December 18, 2024 02:13 pm IST | Source: The Hindu

In a robust defense of Amit Shah, Prime Minister Modi refuted Congress' claims of insults to B.R. Ambedkar, asserting that Shah exposed the party’s historical disrespect towards the Constitution’s architect.

  • Modi emphasized that Congress is trying to obscure their history of insults to Ambedkar.
  • The Prime Minister accused the Congress of using theatrics to distract from the facts presented by Shah.
  • Mr. Modi mentioned the longstanding issues faced by Ambedkar’s legacy under Congress rule.
  • He cited various government initiatives that align with Ambedkar's vision for social justice.
  • Protests occurred in both Lok Sabha and Rajya Sabha related to the controversy.
“They can try as they want but they can't deny that the worst massacres against SC/ST Communities have happened under their regimes.” - PM Modi

The Prime Minister's remarks highlight ongoing tensions between the BJP and Congress, focusing particularly on historical narratives surrounding prominent leaders like Ambedkar.

item.title: Aamir Khan Productions breaks silence over ‘Laapataa Ladies’ Oscars 2025 snub - The Hindu
item.description:
Aamir Khan Productions Reacts to 'Laapataa Ladies' Oscars 2025 Snub

Published: December 18, 2024, Source: The Hindu

Aamir Khan Productions has issued an official statement following the exclusion of Laapataa Ladies from the Oscars 2025 shortlist for Best International Feature Film. The Film Federation of India’s decision to bypass the Kiran Rao-directed satire sparked significant backlash among cinephiles and industry figures alike.

  • The film, which critiques the patriarchy in rural India, was critically acclaimed but not shortlisted for the Oscars.
  • Aamir Khan Productions expressed disappointment but emphasized gratitude for the support received.
  • The statement highlighted the honor of being considered among the finest films globally, despite the snub.
  • Critics have raised concerns about the selection criteria of the Film Federation of India.
  • The situation has drawn attention back to Payal Kapadia’s Cannes-winning film, All We Imagine As Light, viewed as India’s strongest contender.
“Laapataa Ladies did not make it to the Academy Awards shortlist this year, and we are of course disappointed, but equally we are immensely grateful for the incredible support and belief we’ve received throughout this journey.”

The exclusion of Laapataa Ladies adds another chapter to India’s contentious history with the Academy Awards.

item.title: H-1B visa revamp: What employers and students need to know - Hindustan Times
item.description:
H-1B visa revamp: What employers and students need to know

Date: Dec 18, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

The Biden administration has announced reforms to the H-1B visa program aimed at streamlining the application process and curbing abuses within the system.

  • The new rules will take effect on January 17, 2025, requiring a new application form, I-129.
  • Applicants must show that their degree field is directly relevant to the job tied to the visa.
  • Immigration officials can defer to prior approvals for extension requests, streamlining renewals.
  • The USCIS gains enhanced authority for workplace inspections to ensure compliance with H-1B regulations.
  • Filing fees remain substantial: $780 for paper submissions and $730 for online, while small employers and nonprofits face a reduced fee of $460.
“These updates aim to make the H-1B process more efficient and ensure it meets the needs of our evolving economy.” - DHS

This overhaul could have a lasting impact on the program and how international students and professionals navigate the visa process.

item.title: WTC standings: Draw in Gabba leaves India, Australia's fates in balance - The Times of India
item.description:
WTC standings: Draw in Gabba leaves India, Australia's fates in balance

Date: [Publication Date]

Source: [Source Name]

The Brisbane Test between Australia and India ended in a draw due to persistent rain, leaving the World Test Championship final race wide open.

  • Both teams were affected by rain throughout the match, thwarting a clear victory.
  • India needed 275 runs to win after Australia declared their innings at 89/7.
  • The series remains tied at 1-1, with both teams gaining four points towards WTC qualification.
  • South Africa leads the WTC standings, while Australia and India are closely competing for a place in the final.
The unpredictable December weather in Brisbane thwarted both teams' attempts to secure a victory.

This drawn match underscores the competitive nature of the current WTC race, with crucial matches still ahead for both teams.

item.title: Realme 14x 5G launched in India with IP69 rating and 6,000 mAh battery - The Hindu
item.description:
Realme 14x 5G launched in India with IP69 rating and 6,000 mAh battery

Date: December 18, 2024 Source: The Hindu

Realme has launched the Realme 14x 5G smartphone in India, featuring high water resistance and a large battery capacity.

  • First smartphone in the segment with IP68 and IP69 water resistance.
  • 6.67 inch display with a 120 Hz refresh rate and 625 nits brightness.
  • 6,000 mAh battery with a 45 W charger included.
  • Powered by MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipset with up to 8 GB RAM and 128 GB storage.
  • Runs on Realme UI 5.0 based on Android 14.
  • 50 MP rear camera and 8 MP front camera.
  • Available in Crystal Black, Golden Glow, and Jewel Red colors.
  • Price: 6 GB/128 GB variant at ₹14,999 and 8 GB/128 GB variant at ₹15,999.
“The mid-segment phone brings features like sonicwave water ejection and rainwater smart touch.”

The Realme 14x 5G offers robust features for a mid-range smartphone, focusing on durability and performance.

item.title: Poco M7 Pro 5G launched under Rs 15,000: 4 reasons to buy, 1 to skip - India Today
item.description:
Poco M7 Pro 5G launched under Rs 15,000: 4 reasons to buy, 1 to skip

Published On: Dec 18, 2024 | Published By: Aman Rashid

The Poco M7 Pro 5G is an affordable smartphone in the sub-Rs 15,000 price segment, offering impressive features like a 120Hz display and good performance while having some limitations regarding software support.

Key Points:

  • A stunning 120Hz display: 6.67-inch FHD+ AMOLED with peak brightness of 2,100 nits.
  • Sleek and lightweight design: Comfortable to hold with a plastic back and vibrant colors.
  • Reliable performance and battery life: MediaTek Dimensity 7025 Ultra processor with a 5110mAh battery and 45W fast charging.
  • 50MP camera with OIS: Primary camera for high-quality photos with optical image stabilization.

1 reason to skip:

Limited software support: Promises only two years of OS updates and does not ship with the latest Android version.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 13: Allu Arjun’s Franchise Total Surpasses Baahubali 1 + 2 & KGF: Chapter 1 + 2 – Decoding All Hindi Numbers! - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 13: Allu Arjun’s Franchise Total Surpasses Baahubali 1 + 2 & KGF

Publication Date: December 17, 2024 | Source: Koimoi

Allu Arjun has made history with the Hindi version of Pushpa 2, achieving a 13-day box office total of ₹601.50 crore, marking it as the fastest film to reach 600 crores in Indian Cinema.

  • On day 13, the film earned ₹19.50 crore, only ₹1 crore less than the previous day.
  • The total box office collection for both Hindi parts of the franchise is ₹707.50 crore.
  • This franchise has surpassed the box office totals of both Baahubali films and KGF.
“Pushpa 2 is officially now the highest-grossing Hindi-dubbed South Indian franchise at the box office.”

This record-breaking achievement highlights the franchise's immense popularity and the growing success of dubbed South Indian films in Hindi cinema.

item.title: Mukesh Khanna’s half-hearted apology to Sonakshi Sinha amidst Ramayana row sparks outrage; ‘Not so ‘Sorry Shaktimaan’’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Mukesh Khanna’s Half-Hearted Apology to Sonakshi Sinha Sparks Outrage

Date: Dec 18, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Mukesh Khanna has faced backlash following a social media apology regarding his comments on Sonakshi Sinha. The situation escalated after Khanna blamed her father for her performance on a famous quiz show, prompting a response from both Sonakshi and her father, Shatrughan Sinha.

  • Khanna revisited Sonakshi’s 2019 appearance on Kaun Banega Crorepati 11.
  • Sonakshi Sinha reminded Khanna about the value of forgiveness, quoting Lord Rama.
  • Shatrughan Sinha defended his daughter publicly.
  • Khanna claimed he was trying to educate the younger generation with his remarks.
  • Social media users criticized Khanna’s apology, calling it insincere.
“Not so ‘Sorry Shaktimaan’,” commented a user on social media, highlighting Khanna's lack of genuine remorse.

The public reaction indicates that Khanna’s attempt to stay relevant may have backfired, leaving him with diminished respect among fans.

item.title: Laapataa Ladies team disappointed after Kiran Rao's film exits Oscars 2025 race: ‘For us, this is not the end’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Laapataa Ladies Team Disappointed After Oscars 2025 Exit

Date: Dec 18, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

The team behind the film Laapataa Ladies expressed their disappointment after the film did not make the shortlist for the Best International Feature at the Oscars 2025. Despite the setback, they thanked the Academy and celebrated the recognition as India’s official entry.

  • The film failed to secure a position in the Oscars 2025 shortlist.
  • Makers expressed gratitude to the Academy and FFI jury.
  • The film's story revolves around two newly-wed brides exchanged during a train ride.
  • Filmmaker Hansal Mehta criticized the Film Federation of India for its selection process.
  • Fans and critics expressed disappointment on social media regarding the film's exclusion.
“For us, this is not the end but a step forward. We remain committed to bringing more powerful stories to life.”

The Laapataa Ladies team is determined to continue their journey in filmmaking, despite the Oscars disappointment.

item.title: Realme 14X 5G smartphone with 6000 mAh battery, IP68 + IP69 ratings launched in India: Price, specs and m - The Times of India
item.description:
Realme 14X 5G Smartphone Launched in India: Key Features and Pricing

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times of India

The Realme 14X 5G smartphone has been launched in India, featuring a robust 6000 mAh battery and IP68 + IP69 ratings for water and dust resistance.

  • Battery capacity of 6000 mAh for extended usage.
  • IP68 and IP69 ratings ensure durability against water and dust.
  • Supports 5G connectivity for enhanced internet speeds.
  • Affordable pricing aims to attract a wide range of customers.
“The Realme 14X 5G promises not just performance but also resilience with its sturdy build.”

This launch highlights Realme's commitment to providing feature-rich smartphones at competitive prices.

item.title: R Ashwin retires: Emotional scenes, a warm hug as Rohit Sharma bids good bye to his teammate - The Times of India
item.description:
R Ashwin Retires: Emotional Scenes, a Warm Hug as Rohit Sharma Bids Goodbye to His Teammate

Date: Brisbane

Source: Times of India

R Ashwin has officially announced his retirement from international cricket, marking the end of an incredible career. Alongside his captain Rohit Sharma, Ashwin shared an emotional farewell moment with his long-time teammate.

  • Ashwin's announcement came with a heartfelt hug from Rohit Sharma.
  • He expressed gratitude to the BCCI and his fellow players during this tough moment.
  • The announcement occurred following a hard-fought draw against Australia.
  • Ashwin finished his Test career with an impressive total of 537 wickets.
"I had a lot of fun with this team. Would like to thank the BCCI, players and coaches I played with." - R Ashwin

This retirement marks a significant moment for Indian cricket as the team bids farewell to one of its outstanding players.

item.title: Updated WTC 2023-25 Points Table After India-Australia 3rd Test Ends In A Draw - News18
item.description:
Updated WTC 2023-25 Points Table After India-Australia 3rd Test Ends In A Draw

Date: December 18, 2024

Source: News18

The third Test between India and Australia at The Gabba ended in a draw, affecting both teams' standings in the World Test Championship points table.

  • India retained its No. 3 position but saw its PCT% drop from 57.29 to 55.88.
  • Australia's PCT% fell from 60.71 to 58.89.
  • Each team earned 4 WTC points from the match.
  • Rain affected the match, with only Day 2 being fully played.
  • India managed to avoid a follow-on, with notable contributions from Akash Deep and Jasprit Bumrah.
"The Proteas will confirm their spot in the WTC 2025 final if they win the upcoming series against Pakistan 2-0 or 1-0."

This draw impacts both teams' chances in the ongoing World Test Championship cycle as they prepare for future tests.
